sls_detector - Python interface for the slsDetectorsPackage
==============================================================

sls_detector provide Python bindings to the slsDetectorsPackage using mainly the 
multiSlsDetecor API. This module contains two parts, a compiled C module to 
expose the API and a Python class to offer a more Pythonic interface.


.. warning ::
    
    This is an pre-aplha version. Functionality is limited and the interface
    might change at any time
    
.. note ::
    
    For for scripting measurements use the Python class
